parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: Specifies the source table. The database in which the table metadata resides. The name of the table in question.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The database in which the table metadata resides.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: The name of the table in question.

parameters.name: Sinks
parameters.description: A list of target tables. (dict) --- Specifies a table definition in the Glue Data Catalog. The database in which the table metadata resides. The name of the table in question.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The database in which the table metadata resides.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: The name of the table in question.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Parameters for the mapping. Jdbc (list) --- A JDBC location. (dict) --- An argument or property of a node. The name of the argument or property. The value of the argument or property. Param (boolean) --- True if the value is used as a parameter. S3 (list) --- An Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location. DynamoDB (list) --- An Amazon DynamoDB table location. Param (boolean) --- True if the value is used as a parameter.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the argument or property.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the argument or property.

nested_params.name: Param
nested_params.description: True if the value is used as a parameter.

nested_params.name: S3
nested_params.description: An Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location.

nested_params.name: Value

nested_params.description: True if the value is used as a parameter.

nested_items.name: Mapping
